dcterms:description: The Breaking Bad dataset introduces a challenging benchmark where diverse objects are fractured into multiple fragments via physical simulations, facilitating research in geometric fracture and reassembly.
dcterms:title: Breaking Bad dataset

dcterms:description: PartNet is a large-scale benchmark for fine-grained and hierarchical part-level 3D object understanding, providing a comprehensive dataset for segmentation and assembly tasks.
dcterms:title: PartNet

dcterms:creator: Yun-Chun Chen
Haoda Li
Dylan Turpin

Animesh Garg
dcterms:description: The Shape-mating dataset consists of objects that are randomly fractured into two fragments, designed for self-supervised object assembly using adversarial shape priors.
dcterms:title: Shape-mating dataset

dcterms:creator: Nikolas Lamb
Cameron Palmer
Benjamin Molloy

dcterms:description: This dataset contains paired 3D scans of real-world broken objects and their complete counterparts, aimed at facilitating research in object reconstruction and understanding.
dcterms:title: Dataset with real-world broken objects
